issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When getting console output for an instance, text can be left at the prompt. An example is:

{code}
# euca-get-console-output i-EC96408C
i-EC96408C
2012-11-26T23:54:44.008Z

Google, Inc.
Serial Graphics Adapter 12/07/11
SGABIOS $Id: sgabios.S 8 2010-04-22 00:03:40Z nlaredo $ (mockbuild@c6b18n1.dev.centos.org) Wed Dec  7 17:04:47 UTC 2011
Term: 80x24
4 0
















































SeaBIOS (version seabios-0.6.1.2-19.el6)



gPXE (http://etherboot.org) - 00:03.0 C100 PCI2.10 PnP BBS PMM1FE0@10 C100
                                                                               

Probing EDD (edd=off to disable)... ok

Note the ';193R' text at the prompt after getting console output.

comments.body: The fix is to simply make euca-get-console-output escape control codes by default.  To get the old behavior back, use the {{--raw}} switch.
